Articles.Content:
ehrmm guys little problem here...

when I enter any saved game (or create a new one) the KSC doesn't appear, just a black screen...

At first I thought it was because of an incompatibility with my ton of mods but then, when I removed them and updated Kopernicus and MM, nothing changed...

Is it a known issue that I simply haven't seen?

P.S.Should I put this in the development thread?

Could you post your output_log.txt just after entering the save game? It'll be helpful.

Could you post your output_log.txt just after entering the save game? It'll be helpful.

Do you mean the debug log? I can't find the output_log.txt you're talking about.

Try getting a clean copy of KSP and re-install Kopernicus, MM and Other_Worlds and see if it works.
Try getting a clean copy of KSP and re-install Kopernicus, MM and Other_Worlds and see if it works.

Nope,still not working...

I'm running on Linux(Ubuntu 14.04)...maybe that could cause an issue?

Probably not. Make sure Other_Worlds and Kopernicus are directly in your GameData directory. It sounds a bit like an issue I've heard of before with Kopernicus where something isn't installed in the right place so it's looking in the wrong place for its files.

Is the screen stars, or just black?

Working on Vassa Atmosphere. This is how it looks:

EDIT:

Nope,still not working...

I'm running on Linux(Ubuntu 14.04)...maybe that could cause an issue?

Check you have the Kopernicus folder installed correctly (GameData/Kopernicus) and Other_Worlds also (GameData/OtherWorlds)

Edited September 6, 2015 by Pkmniako

Working on Vassa Atmosphere. This is how it looks:

http://i.imgur.com/IiURQQk.pngEDIT:

http://i.imgur.com/La1I1oG.png

Check you have the Kopernicus folder installed correctly (GameData/Kopernicus) and Other_Worlds also (GameData/OtherWorlds)

WOW those cloudes are just glorious!

Unfortunately do I still can't use it...

Ok so im looking in the KSP.log file to see if i can find anything strange...

YEEEESSSSSS!!!! SOLVED IT!

Sooo what was causing the issue was a height map not loading (C2-1 and Disole) because it was capitalized (instead of being C2-1_height.png it was C2-1_Height.png...). Dont know why thow.

Now I can finally enjoy your wonderful mod!

Edited September 6, 2015 by 3MMM
SOLVED IT!

Finishing the mod! (At least the first system)

Version 1.0 will be released in <8 days

WOW those cloudes are just glorious!

Unfortunately do I still can't use it...

Ok so im looking in the KSP.log file to see if i can find anything strange...

YEEEESSSSSS!!!! SOLVED IT!

Sooo what was causing the issue was a height map not loading (C2-1 and Disole) because it was capitalized (instead of being C2-1_height.png it was C2-1_Height.png...). Dont know why thow.

Now I can finally enjoy your wonderful mod!

This may be something all mod developers need to watch out for. Under Linux filenames are case sensitive, under Windows they are not.
This is great work guys! Distant object doesnt work at all when the mod is installed. Is there a way to easily fix this?

This is great work guys! Distant object doesnt work at all when the mod is installed. Is there a way to easily fix this?

It's a Distant Object Enhancement bug. Because Cercani is so far from Kerbol, the exoplanets flares aren't render.

\o/ 1.0! \o/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Science descriptions, stock and DMagic! (Not for all ones).
  • Science and career mode compatibility.
  • Cercani gives less power to the solar panels. x0.5 that of the stock Sun.
  • Cercani's corona can be seen from far.
  • Fixed Nienna's atmosphere.
  • SigmaBinary compatible!
  • PlanetShine compatible!
  • Changed Disole atmosphere to red.
  • Changed Disole and Niko sizes, now they are bigger.
  • Changed Disole, Niko, Troni, Secunda and Prima surface gravity.
  • Changed Nienna moons' orbits. Kevari is much closer, Crons much farther and Niko in a commet-like orbit.
  • Changed Pequar moons' orbits.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
That wouldnt be so bad, but Distant Object doesnt show any objects at all
Yay! Congrats on 1.0 release!

Re-linked the EVE config download.

Yay! Congrats on 1.0 release!

Thanks!

That wouldnt be so bad, but Distant Object doesnt show any objects at all

Remove the Distant Object Enhancement then, located in GameData/OtherWorlds/CercaniSystem/-CONFIGS-/DOE.cfg if you are in the 1.0 version of the mod.
You should put it on CKAN. Last time I checked, you can do that automatically from KerbalStuff.
Neat mod! The planets looks very nice and I really like the star's orange hue! Congrats on the release!

Definitely downloading for a future playthrough:D

That new sun color looks so neat!
After so many years, a new system will be fun to play on!
For some reason i have C2-1's orbit inside of Vassa's body

It's working good for me, thanks! The planets look really nice! But I now made a 50tons 2.5m alcubierre drive ship and it has been traveling for 20 mins now at full speed pointing at Cercani and is not even halfway there yet.. haha.. Is there any way to go faster (I think alcubierre only goes 1.6x the speed of light) ?

I have a probe at Cercani, but because of karma, witchcraft, or a design flaw involving a lack of struts, the Torchdrive engine block and the ore tanks spontaneously and rapidly disassembled while doing orbital insertion. GG, KSP.

I figure that it would be very hard to do an Interstellar Space Program without torchdrives, at least without very clever and precise operation of an Alcubierre drive. Unfortunately there is a tradeoff with the warp drive. You can either have precision or you can have speed. Because it would take insanely long for the speed to be low and the precision to be high, I have to use a high speed, low precision drive.

I suppose I could have a second drive set to a more reasonable precision and lower speed, for in-system maneuvering.

I might look into the more realistic Interstellar instead of using TorchShips and the standalone warp drive.

- - - Updated - - -

For some reason i have C2-1's orbit inside of Vassa's body

I had this as well. It may be a Galactic Neighborhood problem.

Thanks for fixing it so quickly! I removed the DOE.cfg, but still distant object doesnt work. I have like a hundred mods installed, so maybe the bug results from a combination of otherworlds and something else. It works when I remove OtherWorlds though.

Cheers

Version 1.0.1 (Via patch)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B76UBLqbQb_9Q1pQcW9tVndLRWM/view?usp=sharing

  • Fixed C2-1 Agoraphobia (It was inside Vassa)
  • Added a 0.000001 atm and 980 Kelvin atmosphere to Kevari, so now it's actually hot.

This is my favorite "other star and planets" pack that I have discovered to date. I like that it is mostly compatible with other planet packs, and I especially like that you left Kerbol at the "center", since it avoids a whole slew of annoying bugs associated with reparenting Kerbol (and there is actually no science-based reason not to consider Kerbol the center of our reference frame if we want to).

Given the speed at which I progress in this game, I expect to actually visit the Cercani system sometime shortly before I die of advanced old age, but I like looking at it in the tracking station and knowing that it's out there.
